## Feb 25, 2026 — Daily Scan

### ✅ CHARLIE | Nora Sudduth — High-Ticket Business Coach (NEW)
- Role: High-Ticket Business Coach / Fractional CRO / Demand Generation & Conversion Expert
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/noradannersudduth/
- Signal: Provides demand generation, conversion optimization, sales funnel optimization, and fractional CRO services for businesses looking to attract and convert leads. Her focus on lead generation and conversion indicates a strong need for efficient setter solutions.
- Angle: Position Charlie as a powerful tool to enhance her clients' demand generation and conversion efforts, specifically by automating the setter function and improving speed-to-lead for high-ticket offers. Can also position Charlie as a tool she can offer to her fractional CRO clients.

### ✅ CHARLIE | Luisa Zhou — Online Business Coach & Mentor (NEW)
- Role: Online Business Coach & Mentor
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/luisazhou/
- Signal: Helps coaches build and scale profitable businesses, including attracting clients and reaching 7-figure revenue. This indicates a potential need for efficient lead management and setter solutions to handle increased lead volume.
- Angle: Position Charlie as a key tool for her clients (and potentially for her own operations) to automate client acquisition, improve lead response times, and scale their high-ticket coaching and course businesses without additional "hustle."

### ✅ CHARLIE | Kevin Edward Yee — Kaizen Closing (NEW)
- Role: Founder, Inbound Sales Advisor, High-Ticket Sales Coach
- LinkedIn: Recommend checking kaizenclosing.com for social links or search LinkedIn directly for "Kevin Edward Yee Kaizen Closing"
- Signal: Provides inbound sales advisory and coaching for high-ticket offers, focusing on improving conversions and optimizing sales teams for business owners. This directly aligns with Charlie's goal of automating setter functions and improving conversion rates.
- Angle: Position Charlie as a valuable tool to enhance Kaizen Closing's clients' (coaches, consultants, entrepreneurial creatives) sales processes by automating the initial setter phase, improving lead qualification, and ensuring faster speed-to-lead, freeing up their sales teams for high-value closing. Explore partnership opportunities to offer Charlie to his client base.
